issue.title: Make TextDecoder compatible for old NodeJS versions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14711](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14711). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This fix would allow the developer to use older _NodeJS_ versions for running {_}Arrow{_}. An expert review is required for testing the fixed usability.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14711?focusedCommentId=17471270) by Dominik Moritz (domoritz):*
Since we only support supported node versions (see https://nodejs.org/en/about/releases/), we will not fix errors with older node versions.
